name: Slime64
description:
Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021

just a slime game with money and enemies and portals n stuff

fun fact: this is the first game i've ever finished and first time i've participated in a game jam!

all music and visuals made by me.

HOW TO PLAY

Movement - WASD, Arrow keysDash - Left Shift



Collect the specified amount of coins to complete the level.



Red slimes are dangerous. Getting hit is a Game Over.



Portals are very useful. Same-colored portals are connected.



Power-ups make you powerful and let you eat enemies.



Spikes are real spiky.



You can dash with left shift.

If you want, you can download the soundtrack for Slime64 in the download section.

PS: gl with the boss battle :)
